column1: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella on Monday suggested that Microsoft could grow more from its Office 365 line of cloud productivity apps than anything in the company's 43-year history.

The growth opportunity for what is Office 365 is a lot bigger than anything we've achieved, even with our high penetration in the client-server world, Nadella said at the Morgan Stanley Technology Media and Telecom conference in San Francisco.
Microsoft recently introduced the Microsoft 365 bundle
column2: which includes Office as well as Windows
column3: along with enterprise security and mobility services.
